assessments.status_rationale: Powell’s remarks about a prior rate cut and market valuations don’t resolve the FOMC’s early-November 2025 decision.
The AAPL vs. S&P performance window runs through 2025-10-31, and today’s news doesn’t provide the necessary close-to-close data.
Coverage on gold market structure (China’s role) offers no confirmation of an LBMA PM fix at or above $3,800.
No report of an EU DMA non-compliance proceeding or Statement of Objections in today’s bullets.
No mention of Ørsted resuming construction or offshore installation for Revolution Wind.
No new state recognitions of Palestine are reported.
No confirmation of India approving two new semiconductor projects with $6B+ incentives.
No EIA weekly data cited on the 4-week average for finished motor gasoline supplied.
The October 2025 ISM Services PMI has not been released.
No MBA survey figure today indicating a 30-year conforming rate at or below 6.25%.
There is no reported DXY close at or below 101.00.
No weekly insured unemployment update to confirm a reading at or above 1.90 million.
